content: helen s coasters coaster pattern helena shank for craftopia collective sample done in paintbox yarns simply dk beginner friendly and fun to make a stack of these coasters whip up quickly and make both great home decor and gifts named after the original designer and the late matriarch of craftopia collective helen s coasters were made for years from memory with no pattern we are so happy they are now preserved in this pattern for everyone to make their own worked in the round with a series of double crochets these coasters can be made in any yarn you d like have fun with experimenting skill level beginner yardage / colours yarn paintbox yarns simply dk 100% 20 yd / 18 m acrylic 302 yd / 276 m / 100 g hook 5mm / h alternate yarn styleraft special dk notions stitch markers tapestry needle 100% acrylic 323 yd / 295 m / 100 g measuring tape premier basic dk 100% acrylic 306 yds / 280 m / 100 g gauge not important for this pattern adjust hook size to achieve desired size if necessary sizes one size finished coaster measurements 4 5 / 11 5 cm around stitches & techniques pattern notes crocheting in the round ch2 at start of row does not count as abbreviations stitch chain - chain single_crochet - single_crochet skip - skip double_crochet - double_crochet st - stitch repeat - repeat pattern support if you run into problems with this pattern and need some help or if you spot an error you d like to report reach our to us at may@mrsshank ca and let us know copyright 2023 craftopia collective all rights reserved this pattern is for personal use only and may not be copied sold or distributed sshhaarere y yoouur rm maakkees so onn i ninstsataggraramm w witihth t hthee h haashshtatagg mmaayy@@mmrsrsshshaannkk c caa ##ccraraftfotoppiaiaccoolllelecctitvivee a anndd t atagg @ @ccraraftfotoppiaia c coolllelecctitvivee ccraraftfotoppiaiaccoolllelecctitvivee c caa begin pattern chain 3 round 3 - ch2 *double_crochet in first st 2dc in next* x12 36 round 1 - 12dc in 3rd chain from hook slip_stitch into top of first double_crochet in round 12 round 4 - ch1 *single_crochet ch1 sk1 5dc in next st ch1 sk1* x9 round 2 - ch2 2dc in each st around slip_stitch into top of first double_crochet in round 24 tie off and weave in end sshhaarere y yoouur rm maakkees so onn i ninstsataggraramm w witihth t hthee h haashshtatagg mmaayy@@mmrsrsshshaannkk c caa ##ccraraftfotoppiaiaccoolllelecctitvivee a anndd t atagg @ @ccraraftfotoppiaia c coolllelecctitvivee ccraraftfotoppiaiaccoolllelecctitvivee c caa
